review_body: I ordered a transcript and certificate with my latest course, expecting the transcript to be available during the study. It turns out, it is sent out with the certificate on completion of the course. After using the live chat feature, I was offered any course of my choosing in place of a refund of the certificate/transcript fee (£6.99) and I was assigned the course almost instantly.
Smooth transaction in extending my course for a lifetime.
Very helpful man did exactly what he said he would do. Explained everything simply and solved my issue emmediately. Thank you very much.
The team at Janet's is very helpful and understanding and quickly resolved my issue. Highly recommend them.

I have just completed the Diploma in Motorbike Mechanics, overall, I enjoyed it and its good value for money, however, it really does depend on why you are doing this course as to how good it is.  If you are a mechanic doing this for your CPD records or a trainee mechanic who is already established in a garage, then I would give it a higher rating. For me, it was fit for purpose, as I only wanted to learn the basics to do basic fixes myself.  However if you are a wanting to complete this course and be ready to start a trainee position in a garage then I'd go elsewhere, many mechanical terms are not explained (I had to look them up online) and it would be much more useful to have diagrams of the subject matter you are reading about on the page rather than a photo of a random bike! For example, the section about different components of an engine, having a diagram of this would have been so helpful rather than a photo of the outside of a bike engine.  On a side note, the electronic voice-over was so distracting - it went straight off!!  That being said, I'm glad I undertook the course with Janets, great support available, student dashboard easy to navigate with lots of information.
review_header: Enjoyable - Good value for money, however....

review_header: I have had a dreadful year with Covid…

review_body: Where to begin with this mess? Well how about the fact the courses themselves aren't great as A: they are out of date and B: a poorly put together mish mash of multiple existing courses from across the internet. There are no tests or any other means of reviewing your learning as the courses from my experience are just videos. The worst part is I have not received the free certificate that is supposed to be awarded upon completion of the course and there is no response from their support team if there even is one.
review_header: Scam that should be avoided at all costs!

review_body: Copying and pasting random phrases from different websites which make no sense to the context. Bad spelling and grammatical errors, repeated paragraphs with nothing new and informative to divulge in. Probably written by a wannabe blogger from the all ‘in my experience’ where no examples were mentioned whether it be a task asked by client, pricing of any sort or anything you wouldn't already know. Too much use of American association terminology and ‘state by state laws’ when this is meant to be a UK based course with the throw away £ sign here and there. Poor course with zero value. Not even worthy of 1 star. You get more of design insight from a teenager on tiktok decorating their room. Even the stock photos look terrible!
review_header: Supposed 'interior and design diploma'. Awful and embarassing!

review_body: Course was very poor explaned. I was in the course about programming and the guy just questioned himself if the 6 times 120 is 720 or no.. Very bad presentation. Waste of money and time.
The courses are very informative. This is a great way to take a course to see if it is actually what you would like to study at a recognised educational institution.
The course I choose was a massage, aromatherapy and crystal healing.

I have purchased the information technology professional course pack from Janet's using the Reed.co.uk course section at a discount I have passed the level 3 diploma in information technology provided by Janet's and I have done it without any revision whatsoever, I have double checked with Janet's about my concerns about the validity of my ordered certificate and transcript and have received good customer service from Janet's. I have made an enquiry with the London college of professional studies and have shown them the pdf version of the ICT diploma and transcript completed and they have said that I can use this certificate to start an OTHM Level 4 Diploma in information technology.  And the next day after I have completed my final exam for the diploma through Janet's I have completed the CompTia A+ Certification course provided by Janet's and have scored 88/100 also with absolutely no revision whatsoever. I can say that for a fact that if the LCPS have accepted the diploma as a level 3 qualification it must mean something extremely significant. And if it is all right and correct I can easily say that the certificates have changed my life.
So happy with the course and the ability to self-pace. Also customer care were extremely helpful with any dealings. Will definitely continue to use and recommend.
review_header: So happy with the course and the…

review_body: Lovely people to communicate with. Fabulous range of courses and all at reasonable prices.

Completed the Car Maintenance Course. Overall the course was informative and for the price of the course it was fine with me. When i tried to place a review on the course i was informed that the reviews were disabled with the course. Why disable the review???does not make sense. If i were to describe the course it could be dramatically improved with the different points.  a few more pictures to show the point or what part of the car it was referring to would make things better and much clearer for the student. In summary the course is very broad, good as a introduction only. The course should be renamed Car Maintenance Course -> An introduction. The title as now can be misleading depending on your background. Great for the beginner, but not for anyone who knows you way around a car.

Funny comment below made 4h ago. I got a bundle of 5 courses. I started 1 of them and it wasn't for my surprise that the content of the course was old and outdated. Not to mention the orthography errors in the mock exam. Recently I decided to start another course I've bought and I noticed that there was just 2 moths left... Each course is self paced 1 year, all of them are sold individually, so if I just started one why all 5 started counting? JANETS logic is if you buy 1 course you have 1 year to finish it, and if you buy 5 you have that same year to finish them.
review_header: A kind and reliable way to scam

I found the course really easy to get through and very informative. It is broken down into modules that are great and short for doing when you have limited time and can go back to. Found all the instructions to be clear and great that there were mock tests to help prepare for the actual exam. The presenter said there were mini exams at the end of each module but these were not available to me.
Customer service helped me with a problem I had. They worked efficiently to resolve it for me.

review_body: Was enjoyable! Very easy!

I brought two courses from reed for this side, which were British Sign Language and a training course. Did the training course really quickly, wouldn't complain about it was easy however wouldn't recommend if looking for something more advanced. The sign language course is again very simple to follow however if wanting to learn for a serious reason and not just for fun/interest I would suggest learning about how to "speak" sign language as the videos only show the signs (which you copy) and not the order to sign them  for a sentence. The online chat was very helpful and sorted my request within minutes of asking unlike some other websites I've used in the past hence the 4 stars.

The course contents are easy to read and understand and the videos are very useful to explain what was learnt. Thank you Janets, you’re doing a great job!

review_body: My daughter has completed her first course and enrolled on to the next level. The courses are easy to access and her certificate arrived quickly. I like that she has an account which tracks her achievements also that she can get a student card, this is great as she is home educated but feels like a real student. I had a query which I emailed about and it was answered really quickly.

Space not enough, numerous way Janets made me happy. First of all, the Cost! An IT diploma less then £300 much affordable also some time promotions it might cost you under £20. It’s a real IT diploma course. Second customer service particularly in online hard to see that they are so professional and take thing so seriously until your matter or issue not solve. Prompt email reply and live chat awesome and simply awesome. Third-course content and videos of the lessons properly organised, structured and adequate time. It’s worth studying. I did so many online courses but till now no one match Janets. Moreover there student ID card well recognised by the industry. Amount of discount you will get basically it’s free education. I personally recommend you to join and enjoy your desire course. Thumbs up for Janets.

review_body: I have just completed a Xero accounting software course and the only way to describe it was terrible. For a start, the course was based on the software back as far as 2017. Immediately its outdated as there have been several updates since then. Secondly, the person providing the course did not have a clue! She spent a lot of time looking through tabs to find where to find information relating to the task and even put in incorrect information from the print off provided. This had a knock on as I went through the course as she had to keep correcting her mistakes. The information given only related to anyone who didn't use the bank/credit card feeds which probably relates to very few people. To top it all, at the end of the course which took a couple of days of my life which I will never get back, they ask for payment for the certificate. All in all, pathetic.
review_header: Xero Accounting Sotware - dont even bother…

review_body: Just completed my first course with Janets. A very good course. Only gripe is that it was very Americanised which was not applicble to out teaching systems, and a few spelling mistakes here and there. Otherwise no issues.

review_body: Great course, simple and easy to follow. Will be recommending to others.
I would recommend. I bought 2 courses from them and have just started studying.  Customer service team are quite responsive.  I haven't had any long standing issues so far.
Good choice of courses

The course I have completed in Advance Diploma in Office Administration has been great! There is a lot of valuable information provided in the form of handouts and I like the fact that the material can be viewed in full screen mode, presentation mode, or as small print handouts. The site itself is very easy to manoeuvre around- it is user friendly. There are videos also added to each module. The course can also be completed on your mobile phone which is also very handy! I found the information to do with Word, Powerpoint and Excel very useful to put into practice with all the documents I need to produce for work purposes. I learnt a lot of things that I didn't know before and I am happy I can put this qualification on my CV and it should help my job prospects a great deal now! Thank you Ronnie at the helpdesk so much for the quick responses to my emails whenever I had any issues. Your services are great and you are efficient as a Training provider.
I completed the Pharmacy Assistant and Technician Foundation Training yesterday. No faults at all and received my E-Certificate today and waiting on my hard copy.

Also, they were sneaky and will try get extra money from you for the certificate even though the e-certificate is included.
